nodes.text: Andoan wine was a type of wine produced on Ando, the homeworld of the Aqualish species. In 22 BBY, Andoan wine was being served at the Outlander Club on the planet Coruscant and was kept in a bottle on the counter behind the club's central bar. By the year 3 ABY, the human pilot Thane Kyrell had developed a taste for the drink over time.

Andoan wine was first mentioned in the 2015 canon novel Lost Stars, which was written by Claudia Gray. The 2019 reference book Star Wars: How Not to Get Eaten by Ewoks and Other Galactic Survival Skills retconned one of the drinks visible in the 2002 prequel trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones, to be Andoan wine. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, the beverage previously appeared in "The Great Herdship Heist," a 1997 short story written by Daniel Wallace and published in Star Wars Adventure Journal 15.
